content: Why don't we make the user list collapsible?
Do you mean the user list in the right sidebar?

Yes, the user list in the right sidebar. The list can be a source of distraction, and we could make the filter user button keep working when the list is collapsed so it's not necessary to expand the list when you want to find someone to send a pm
I find it distracting too. I use my Zulip window at half my screen width, because that automatically collapses the user list.
